title: How has people's interest in health changed in your country?

korean: 최근 몇 년 사이 한국 사람들의 건강에 대한 관심이 정말 높아진 것 같아.
특히 코로나 이후로 면역력 관리에 더 신경 쓰게 됐어.
헬스장이나 필라테스 같은 운동 시설이 정말 많이 생겼어.
식습관도 많이 바뀌어서 채식이나 비건에 관심 있는 사람들이 늘었어.
건강한 메뉴를 제공하는 식당들도 많이 생기고 있어.
웨어러블 기기로 건강 데이터 체크하는 사람들도 많아.
멘탈 헬스에 대한 인식도 좋아져서 상담 받는 걸 당연하게 생각하는 분위기야.
회사에서도 직원 건강 관리 프로그램을 제공하는 곳들이 늘었어.
전체적으로 건강이 단순히 아프지 않는 게 아니라 웰빙이 중요하다고 생각하는 것 같아.
english: In recent years, people's interest in health in Korea seems to have, like, really increased.
Especially after COVID, people became more concerned about managing immunity.
Many exercise facilities like gyms and Pilates studios have really appeared.
The number of people doing home training has also increased tremendously.
There are really many exercise videos on YouTube too.
Eating habits have also changed a lot, and people interested in vegetarian or vegan diets have increased.
Restaurants offering healthy menus are also appearing.
The nutritional supplement and health functional food market has also, you know, grown tremendously.
Many people also check health data with wearable devices.
Awareness of mental health has also improved, so there's an atmosphere where getting counseling is considered natural.
Companies that provide employee health management programs have also increased.
Overall, it seems people think health is not just about not being sick, but that well-being is important.
